changelog.title: Persistent Timezone Storage
changes: Added timezone column to database users table
Timezone preferences now saved permanently per user
Auto-load user timezone on login from any browser/device
Default timezone set to Asia/Makassar for new users
No more need to set timezone after every login

changelog.title: Toast Notifications & UI Improvements
changes: Added login and logout toast notifications
Moved all toast notifications from top-right to bottom-right
Fixed timezone conversion issues in memo timestamps
Database now stores timestamps in user's selected timezone
Improved memo sidebar with 3-line format (Title, Created, Updated)
Enhanced responsive sidebar toggle behavior

changelog.title: Initial Release
changes: Complete memo notepad application with SQLite3 database
Secret key authentication system
Create, read, update, delete memos functionality
Search memos by title and content
Dark theme with FontAwesome icons
Responsive design with collapsible sidebar
Auto-save feature for memo editing
Settings page with security key management
Database backup download functionality
Timezone selection with multiple options
Pretty URLs with .htaccess configuration
Security headers and database protection
Modern UI with toast notifications and modals
